creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: woven panel with fringe at ends; light blue and purple stripes, with thin yellow stripes, and dark blue and white ikat-motif stripes
signed: at one corner, in red cross-stitches: [G Y (?)]
title: Rebozo
